applicationUrl
The function returns the address of the current
applications
.
Syntax
applicationUrl
()
No parameters.
Note
The function is called from the
"Additional"
tab on the toolbar of the algorithm editor.
In
SaaS solution
, the function returns the address of the current application, consisting of a static part "https://app.greendata.ru " and the dynamic part of the url corresponding to the current application in
On-Premise solution
is the value of the
url
parameter specified in the
configuration file
of the application.
If necessary, for example, to specify the path to a specific object, the received application address can be supplemented using the
"text"
function:
